pr_title: FLEX-5303 Handle IEC60870 light measurement events

timeline.message:
FLEX-5303 ~ Handles IEC60870 light measurement events

Implements IEC60870 event acquisition scenario for light measurement
devices spontaneously sending an ASDU with data concerning the light
sensor status.
The data with the event is translated to an event notification for the
platform indicating whether the light sensor of the light measurement
device reports dark or light.

Update the default device type from DA_DEVICE (old name of a renamed
enum value) to DISTRIBUTION_AUTOMATION_DEVICE.

timeline.author: robindenadel

replies.bodyText:
I replaced the anonymous class by a lambda expression.
It may be better if we figure out if one form or the other is a preferred way of handling things.
Without a declared preference this might just lead to changing "in the other direction" in some other pull request.
